1.title: Crown King
1.plot: Somewhere in Arizona discovers a historic town right out of the 1800's, Crow King, Arizona. Complete with the oldest standing Saloon in Arizona. Later, Angela goes on an adventure deep inside Gold Mines with modern day prospectors, Dan Starkey and Steve Slater. Our show concludes with Operation Homefront of Arizona. Learn about this great organization, and how you can get involved. While at OHF's 9-11 Freedom Walk, Angela speaks with Arizona Congressman Trent Franks on the importance of continued support of our Troops.

3.title: Motivational Small Talk
3.plot: SEGMENT 1 - Motivational Small Talk: Mark Trombino is a 3 foot man with a 10 foot message. You might remember him from the Arizona Lottery commercials, or segments on ESPN. Mark Trombino is a little person with a giant mission. " In order to realize our vision of making a positive difference in the world, the mission of Motivational Small Talk is to provide quality programs individualized for all ages that focus on diversity education, bully prevention and overcoming life's obstacles." Mark Trombino SEGMENT 2 - Writing in Style: When was the last time you wrote ...

5.title: FireFly at Greenstock
5.plot: FIREFLY at Greenstock - Somewhere in Arizona spent an afternoon back stage with FireFly at the 1st Annual Greenstock Concert Series and Expo. Discover this fresh young group, and see why they are being called "a breath of fresh country air." Firefly has entertained audiences from Arizona to New York, opening for LeAnn Rimes, Steve Wariner, Carrie Underwood, Wynonna Judd.....

imdb.title: Somewhere in Arizona
plot: Features interesting people, places, and events that are beneficial to the communities of Arizona.::Andrew Yousse
